item.title: Unmute,unban command
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

now look when i mute someone, it will write his name in the mute list.
if i wanna unmute him i need to go to the list and delete his name.
how do i make a command for unmuting and unbaning.

i already got this

} if (command.startsWith("unmute")) { try { String muted = command.substring(7); int playerMuted = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(muted); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerMuted]; m.sM("A member of staff has lifted your mute, allowing you to talk again"); sM(muted+" is no longer permanently muted"); } catch(Exception e) { sM("Enter the name of the player you want to unmute"); } }
okey the problem is… it doesnt erease the name out of the list…
so if someone can help me and make an unban then i will be happy

greetz dane

Read full topic
